alerts.ghtoken:
Nightly build requires GitHub authentication! Do you want to proceed?
The application will open web page for token generation, you should create a fine-grained token there with whatever name and expiration date. Leave all the settings the same and just hit "Generate token" button, then copy the result token to the corresponding settings field.
alerts.unavail: This feature is not available in your current emulator version!
alerts.unsaved: You have unsaved settings! Are you sure you want to exit?
alerts.multiplekb: You have multiple gamepad backends set to "keyboard" it is not recommended since keyboard backend does not allow you to assing different buttons for each gamepad so pressed keybind will be reported to each emulated gamepad! Do you want to continue?

actions.alrun: You should close your previous game first!
actions.nogame: You should select the game first!
actions.reqrst: One or more changed settings requires restart!

firstrun.text: Welcome to psOff advanced launcher! Do you want to open the launcher settings?

warns.newver: New version of psOff emulator is available! Do you want to download it? (Installed: {currver}, New: {newver})
warns.noemu: Looks like you have no psOff emulator installed. Would you like the launcher to download the latest release ({latest})?
warns.downproc: Downloading the emulator binaries, hang tight...

errors.checkfail: Failed to check updates for your psOff installation: {error}
errors.nonightly: You have no GitHub token installed, nightly update check is impossible!
